statements: UPDATE quantum_error_correction SET quantum_data = '1010101010', error_type = 'bit_flip' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE quantum_error_correction SET quantum_data = '101010', error_type = 'Z' WHERE id = 2

UPDATE QuantumTransmissionLogs SET transmission_status = FALSE, receiver_address = 'Bob' WHERE log_id = 3;

UPDATE QuantumDataTransmissionLogs SET success = false, data_size = 500 WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE QuantumNetworkNodes SET node_name = 'Quantum Hub' WHERE node_id = 1;
UPDATE QuantumErrorCorrectionHistory SET error_correction_type = 'Parity Check' WHERE success = true;
